name: Card Match - Puzzle Game
description:
Every layout is a unique mix of colored cards that have a value. Enjoy this zen experience. Free Your Mind.

Gameplay is simple and deep at the same time. This is a classic shedding-card game with a twist!

Use Boosters to finish levels when you're stuck!

Features:
• One Tap Game
• 400+ Levels
• Dozens of Layouts
• Fast and Keen
• Relaxing Graphics
• Satisfying Puzzles
• Optimal Performance for Any Device!
• Boosters to Help

WARNING! Extremely addictive.
